author: Kokila Chokkanathan
title: Bihar Agroforestry Scheme: Plant Saplings for ₹10, Earn 6 Times the Benefit in 3 Years
text:
Bihar Agroforestry Scheme: Plant Saplings for ₹10, Earn 6 Times the Benefit in 3 Years
The Bihar Agroforestry Scheme is a win-win initiative for farmers and the environment. With minimal investment, farmers can secure long-term financial benefits while contributing to a greener, sustainable rural landscape.
